section.p: The Instructions Section records instructions given to a patient. List patient decision aids here.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-10112, CONF:1098-31384, CONF:1098-32599 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Instructions Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15375)/@code="69730-0" Instructions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15376, CONF:1098-32148)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-10116, CONF:1098-31398)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Instructions Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15375)/@code="69730-0" Instructions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15376, CONF:1098-32148)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:10114, R2.0=CONF:1098-10114)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:10115, R2.0=CONF:1098-10115)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-10116, CONF:1098-31398)
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)
If section/@nullFlavor is not present:

body.codeblock: <section xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" nullFlavor="NI"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45"/> <code code="69730-0" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Instructions"/> <title>Instructions</title> <text>eIaxbCIW TjcbG FyhNxd wTaOY ZLEeas conQxaACD zboeqI VCfVdiQia MtivNiU bmvGt TOMLPa uTYgWA ZgxKrGK xLiQaiSkJ mjtXnYql vzEWalQE MpDdCwqlB hBrESYjt vXHTSKa SZhqTfbv eZKRusr PYnZnAh AfclQeCR REkJQZ vGGlldxA DznqeLziq whwDhVyZv VqOgckI EDGlOOp FasHNi YStEjEG vXqTCLL NUfxy qaVtjj ANwSY PbjQFCuF qvIcONccC wkADkJWWb sVsZlrEI pDOZWcFut cCcwTI KnwkgwDUU ZmjZTeo hfwVAL QTJnAKFt wOIivqxZ hqmgwYLQ WQarMblv bHyFDtxjj CLmjx jBVwxjap nUYdYjIVC ujZQoSCsd vsONLTIWU gUcTR zqdrMxb UmzkC XymAbHxHm EGHRr FhrOxRY WUZzYXCZc vHOfcC IggNmsuq YMcIzcxY ubWYKoXMl Lxzvyo KoHeEv davcfL kHoUuwFgj LdrCUat AtlYfw RdQvYGJBp ysEfLIO XuUmKwW SgOeXle FWabA DcvulHV DmDiUo UXdqEOSi NYjfr mRGrX YKOxZd frAOheI vKZkzYMGR oqoCOi mQNuz hXJebl SKNcr adGjW iNbMGLUNu AftcqD vmBJdVl DhTCfyH rrgWbYPsT HxCcwTn sylSVqh TksnIq qKghewlx iPQXHdHb QYQfECGx lrUaTnM xvoVz ioztLcI </text> <entry> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </act> </entry> </section>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10112, CONF:10402 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.45"
Consol Instructions Section SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15375)/@code="69730-0" Instructions (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15376)
